DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine patient characteristics from patients that have used Iressa for a period of minimal 3 years.
DOC.brief_title: Observations From Long Term Responders in the Gefitinib (Iressa) Expanded Access Program (EAP)
DOC.criteria: Participation in the gefitinib Expanded Access Program Patient still uses gefitinib in September 2009
